description:
Matcher is a predicate configuration. Based on the config a set of field(s) or values is filtered in order to apply override / transformation.
It comes with in id ( to resolve implementation from registry) and a configuration thatâ€™s specific to a particular matcher type.

id.description: The matcher id. This is used to find the matcher implementation from registry.

options.description: The matcher options. This is specific to the matcher implementation.

title: MatcherConfig
